title: Bug 104630 - Column icons are not displayed when connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not showing up. It seems to be a display issue.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not visible in the user interface.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons should be displayed next to each column in the user interface.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Launch the application
2. Connect to a Derby database
3. Navigate to the table view
4. Observe that the column icons are missing.
